conclusion: Net work done in one clockwise cycle equals the area enclosed by the path on a p-V diagram.
Points are A(2 L, 1×10⁵ Pa), B(2 L, 4×10⁵ Pa), and C(5 L, 1×10⁵ Pa); the path encloses a right-triangle ABC.
Base (A→C): ΔV = 5 L – 2 L = 3 L = 0.003 m³
Area = ½ (ΔV)(Δp) = ½ (0.003 m³)(3×10⁵ Pa) = 450 J
Work done by the gas on the surroundings during the entire cycle: W_cycle = +450 J
